tool_description: Organizes and validates participant contact information across multiple communication channels, ensuring proper formatting and removing duplicates.
error_messages: Invalid email format: One or more email addresses are not in valid format.
Invalid phone format: Phone numbers must include country code and be 10-15 digits.
Empty participant_ids: At least one participant ID is required.
Duplicate participant_ids: Participant IDs must be unique.
Mismatched array lengths: If provided, emails and phones arrays must match participant_ids length.
usage: Provide participant_ids and optionally participant_emails and participant_phones. Set remove_duplicates to clean data. Returns organized and validated participant records.

email_count.description: Number of participants with email addresses

phone_count.description: Number of participants with phone numbers

validation_status.description: Overall validation status of the participant list
